meanings.definition: A small boat carried on a ship for use in emergencies.
meanings.sent1: The crew quickly launched the lifeboats when the ship started sinking.
meanings.sent2: Passengers were instructed to board the lifeboats in an orderly manner.
meanings.sent3: During the drill, the captain accidentally fell into one of the lifeboats.
meanings.sent4: The lifeboats became the heroes of the night, saving everyone on board.
meanings.sent5: The bright orange color of the lifeboats stood out against the dark sea.

meanings.definition: A boat designed for rescuing people from a sinking ship.
meanings.sent1: The lifeboats were lowered into the water to rescue the passengers.
meanings.sent2: The lifeboats were equipped with supplies to ensure the safety of the rescued individuals.
meanings.sent3: The lifeboats bobbed up and down in the rough waves, looking like playful dolphins.
meanings.sent4: The lifeboats symbolized hope and salvation for those stranded at sea.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the lifeboats hitting the water echoed through the night.
